Name: Thessaloniki
Description: The capital and largest city of the region, known for its rich cultural history, vibrant atmosphere, and historical landmarks.

Name: Nea Filadelfeia
Description: A municipality known for its suburban setting and modern cultural life.

Name: Nea Ionia
Description: A vibrant suburb of Thessaloniki known for its dynamic community and proximity to the city center.

Name: Kalamaria
Description: A coastal municipality famous for its scenic waterfront and lively commercial areas.

Name: Pylaia-Chortiatis
Description: A municipality known for its blend of natural beauty and modern urban living.

Name: Perea
Description: A seaside town near Thessaloniki, known for its beach and relaxed atmosphere.
